Text: One investor, Fosun Tourism Group, the owner of Club Med, had committed £450m to Thomas Cook under the plan to save the business.
Cause: the plan to save the business.
Effect: One investor, Fosun Tourism Group, the owner of Club Med, had committed £450m to Thomas Cook
